strapiPost.title: Orchards Park Playground & Dog Park To Open Tomorrow
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville Parks and Recreation is inviting the community to tomorrow's grand opening celebration of the Orchards Park Dog Park & Playground. 

  • New toys: The park sits on the corner of J St and John DeShields Blvd and has been under construction for about a year. The new playground features swings and a permanent chime and percussion area for kids of all ages. The dog park has fenced areas for small and large dogs, shade structures, rock outcroppings, and more.
  • A space to be: Pups in the Park â€” a pet-friendly luau with an agility course, vendor samples, and food trucks will be taking place to mark the occasion. The dog park and playground will officially open at 10a. If you can't make it out tomorrow, go see the park during An Evening at Orchards Park on July 4th for a fireworks celebration!

Read the KNWA story HERE.
